title: Vous revoir
text: When Arthur returns to San Francisco after a self-imposed exile in Paris, he rediscovers his best friend, his job, and the city he loves. The one thing missing is Lauren: the woman he had sacrificed everything to save, only to lose her minutes later. Arthur is resigned to never see Lauren again. But when fate intervenes, it is Laurenâ€™s turn to save Arthur, if she can find him in time. es:Volver a verte (novela) fr:Vous revoir
